Organisation Name: Cheshire Constabulary on behalf of the Police and Crime Commissioner for Cheshire
Title: BREEAM Advisor for New Crewe Fire & Police Station
Description:
Cheshire Fire Authority are undertaking a construction project, in conjunction with Cheshire Police to rebuild their existing Fire Station at Crewe with a new Joint Fire and Police Station. As a part of the initial feasibility studies into this project the Fire Authority wishes to appoint a BREEAM Adviser .  

This is a contract award notice.

Subject to the outcome of the Feasibility Stage and subject to approval to proceed, the current intention is to procure on a Design & Build basis under an existing Framework Agreement.

Title: Your Housing Group - Professional Services Framework
